swirl.workspace
Class PeerManager

java.lang.Object
  swirl.workspace.PeerManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.picocontainer.Startable
public class PeerManager
extends Object
implements org.picocontainer.Startable

Maintains list of known peers for application and manages message information about their joining and leaving

Author:
bpillet
